testimonialsHero.title: Our Satisfied Patients
testimonialsHero.description: Hear from our patients about their experiences and the high-quality care they received.

sheilaPeterson.description: Dr. Aleksa – honestly his professionalism and patience is incredible. I am on holiday here and I was nervous to have dental work as I am alone. He was so assuring, kind, encouraging and very gentle. He is truly a top dentist. He has now made a regular customer even if I have to travel from London here. Thank you so much and continue the great work!

lauraBastone.description: I am very satisfied. High expertise, great attention and courtesy. Thank you very much.

lelaKovacMajcevski.description: Dental interventions are often painful. That is also my experience, however, Dr. Šuković and his team are truly very professional. The atmosphere is pleasant, without tension, and the patient feels that they are in safe hands here. They are very courteous, easy to arrange appointments with. It is neat and clean. It seems that everything is truly dedicated to the patient. Dr. Dražen and the rest of the team are very responsible. In any case, I heartily recommend this hospital to everyone. Everything here is organized with the patient in mind.

marryDianaJones.description: My many years of experience at the Ars Medica clinic can be described as more than excellent. The doctors and staff are professional, dedicated, and very kind. The quality of services is at the highest level in an environment of renowned world clinics.

procedures.title: Dental Implants
procedures.shortDescription: Replace missing teeth with durable implants.
procedures.necessity: When you have one or more missing teeth.

procedures.title: Zirconium Crowns
procedures.necessity: When you need strong and natural-looking crowns.

procedures.title: Your Perfect Smile
procedures.shortDescription: Achieve a perfect smile with veneers.

procedures.title: All-on-4
procedures.necessity: When you need full arch restoration.

procedures.title: All-on-6
procedures.necessity: When you need full arch restoration with extra stability.

procedures.title: Teeth Whitening
procedures.shortDescription: Brighten your smile with professional whitening.
procedures.necessity: When you want to remove stains and discoloration.
procedures.candidate: Patients looking to brighten their smile.

procedures.title: Dental Veneers
procedures.shortDescription: Enhance your smile with custom veneers.
procedures.necessity: For improving the appearance of teeth.
procedures.candidate: Patients with chipped, stained, or misaligned teeth.

procedures.title: Root Canal Treatment
procedures.necessity: When you have an infected or inflamed tooth pulp.
procedures.candidate: Patients with severe tooth pain or infection.

procedures.title: Dental Bridges
procedures.shortDescription: Replace missing teeth with a dental bridge.
procedures.necessity: When you have one or more missing teeth.
procedures.candidate: Patients with good oral health and adjacent teeth.

procedures.title: Gum Contouring
procedures.shortDescription: Reshape your gums for a better smile.
procedures.candidate: Patients with excessive or uneven gums.

procedures.title: Full Mouth Reconstruction
procedures.necessity: When you need extensive dental work.
